article_title: One killed in Destin motorcycle crash
article_text:
The Okaloosa County Sheriff’s Office is investigating a fatal motorcycle crash in Destin early Sunday morning.

The 51-year old man, who has been identified as Robert Joseph Meyer of Santa Rosa Beach in Walton County, was driving his 2012 Harley Davidson east on Emerald Coast Parkway around 3:20 a.m. when he left the roadway and crashed.

He was pronounced dead at the scene. That is all the information that has been released at this time.
